title: Diesel & Petrol shipments to reach Sri Lanka
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) stated that two vessels carrying 40,000 MT of Diesel and 37,500 MT of Patrol are scheduled to arrive in the country on Thursday (14).
The Chairman of the CPC, Sumith Wijesinghe said that the distribution of the fuel will begin soon.
However, many Sri Lankans were seen waiting in line at filling stations on Thursday (14) as well.
We should overcome this challenge with unity and better understanding: President
